app.title: Image Caption Generator
app.subtitle: Add beautiful captions to your images
app.description: A simple and easy-to-use online image caption tool that allows you to add custom text, adjust font styles and positions

upload.hint: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF formats, max 10MB

help.title: Help
help.howToUse: How to Use Image Caption Generator
steps: Click the 'Choose Image' button or drag and drop an image to the upload area
Enter caption text in the right editing panel
Adjust font, size, color, and position
Click 'Generate Image' to preview the result
Click 'Download' to save the result when satisfied

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Q: What image formats are supported?
faq.a1: A: JPG, PNG, GIF and other common image formats are supported.
faq.q2: Q: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a2: A: Yes, the maximum file size is 10MB.
faq.q3: Q: How do I adjust the caption position?
faq.a3: A: Click the buttons in the position grid to quickly position your caption.
